A C D G L M O R S T U W 

A

AddNewTimeTblDB(String, String) - Method in class controllers.ApplicationHandler
Adds a new timetable database for a given department and will be loaded from a given url
ADEController - Class in main
Handles the actions of the user and executes the commands
ADEController() - Constructor for class main.ADEController
Constructor of the ADEController class
ADEHandler - Class in controllers
Used to read and build the daily timetable specific for a department In a case of the application exiting, this class could be serialized to store the data in a file which will be read at the PC's restart
ADEHandler() - Constructor for class controllers.ADEHandler
 
ApplicationHandler - Class in controllers
Handler of this app which coordinates all actions according to the current state of the system
ApplicationHandler() - Constructor for class controllers.ApplicationHandler
Constructor of the ApplicationHandler class
ApplicationHandler(String, int, HashMap<String, TreeMap<Float, ArrayList<Course>>>, HashMap<String, String>) - Constructor for class controllers.ApplicationHandler
Constructor of the ApplicationHandler class
AppliStop() - Static method in class controllers.ApplicationHandler
Allows the TimeHandler thread to check the stop value set in this class
